ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the 4 year anniversary celebration, and the Death of Zombie Tramp event is in full swing with a battle royale featuring Black Betty, Dollface, Vampblade and more! The epic 50th issue spectacular has an extra-length story that changes everything!!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from series creator Dan Mendoza (DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Celor | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Celor | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Bill McKay | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Bill McKay | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 | RE-SDCC-A | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Variant Cover A | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | 7 | RE-SDCC-B | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Variant Cover B | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | 8 | RE-SDCC-C | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Variant Cover C | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | 9 | RE-SDCC-D | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Variant Cover D | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | 10 | RE-SDCC-E | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Risqué Variant Cover A | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | Missing | RE-SDCC-F | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Risqué Variant Cover B | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | Missing | RE-SDCC-G | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Risqué Variant Cover C | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | Missing | RE-SDCC-H | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Connecting Risqué Variant Cover D | Dan Mendoza (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | Missing | RE-SDCC-I | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Deluxe Edition Silver Foil Variant Cover | Dan Mendoza | 12 | RE-SDCC-J | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Deluxe Risqué Edition Silver Foil Variant Cover | Dan Mendoza | Missing | RE-SDCC-K | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Blank Sketch Variant Cover | None | 13 | Regular SDCC variants combinedSan Diego Comic Con Variant Checklist
